overview:
## Discussion

Use this property to specify the search results. Each [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INBillDetails] object should contain information about a single bill that matches the search criteria. Always provide as much detail as possible in each [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INBillDetails] object.

# bills

**Instance Property**

The bills found during the search.

## Declaration

```swift
var bills: [INBillDetails]? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to specify the search results. Each [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INBillDetails] object should contain information about a single bill that matches the search criteria. Always provide as much detail as possible in each [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INBillDetails] object.
title: bills
